transl1: Distributor Training | Healthcare Logistics & Medical Supplies | Owens & Minor
transl17: What is corruption and how can my business avoid it? In what situations can corruption occur? Find out in this 15-minute eLearning course that all Distributors should complete periodically.
transl18: Distributor employees must understand and follow all applicable compliance laws, codes, and standards of behavior, particularly when interacting with healthcare professionals and government officials.
transl19: Use any Internet-connected device to complete this anti-corruption training and confirm your understanding of and agreement to the Vendor Code of Honor.
transl31: Use of this site or any documents included in this site are for demonstration purposes only and should not be considered legal advice nor an endorsement for your compliance program. Always seek legal advice for your specific situation before building a compliance program.
